title: Rust Trait Inheritance and Composition
description: In this lab, we explore how to define traits in Rust as supersets of other traits, allowing for the implementation of multiple traits through subtraits.

meta.title: Rust Trait Inheritance and Composition
meta.description: Learn how to define traits in Rust as supersets of other traits, enabling the implementation of multiple traits through subtraits.
